overview.title: About Om India
overview.subtitle: Leading the Industrial Packaging Industry
overview.description: Om India Total Packaging Solutions is a dedicated leader in the packaging industry, committed to integrating innovative technologies, sustainable practices, and a customer-centric approach. Our focus on delivering cutting-edge packaging solutions not only enhances product safety and brand visibility but also contributes to a more sustainable future in packaging. We strive to meet the evolving needs of our clients while maintaining the highest standards of quality and environmental responsibility.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide superior packaging solutions that protect products, enhance brand value, and contribute to sustainable business practices while building lasting partnerships with our clients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted and innovative packaging solutions provider globally, setting industry standards for quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

boardOfDirectors.name: Shivkumar Gurav
boardOfDirectors.bio: Visionary leader with extensive experience in industrial packaging and business development.

boardOfDirectors.name: Priyadarshani Gurav
boardOfDirectors.bio: Operational excellence expert driving efficiency and quality across all business operations.

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: Started operations with a focus on corrugated packaging solutions.

timeline.title: Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded into specialized industrial packaging and protective materials.

timeline.title: ISO Certification
timeline.description: Achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification for quality management systems.

timeline.title: Technology Upgrade
timeline.description: Invested in state-of-the-art manufacturing equipment and automated systems.

timeline.title: Sustainability Initiative
timeline.description: Launched eco-friendly packaging line and sustainability programs.

timeline.title: Market Leadership
timeline.description: Became the preferred packaging partner for 1000+ companies across various industries.
